scripts.stack:up: docker compose up -d db redis jaeger
scripts.stack:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d db redis jaeger
scripts.db:psql: docker compose exec db psql -U postgres -d casino
scripts.db:ping: docker compose exec db pg_isready -U postgres -d casino
scripts.db:reset: docker compose exec -u postgres db psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS casino; CREATE DATABASE casino;" && yarn prisma:deploy
scripts.redis:ping: docker compose exec redis redis-cli ping
scripts.prisma:gen: docker compose run --rm toolbox bash -lc "yarn prisma generate --schema=libs/db/schema.prisma"
scripts.prisma:dev: docker compose run --rm toolbox bash -lc "yarn prisma migrate dev --schema=libs/db/schema.prisma"
scripts.prisma:deploy: docker compose run --rm toolbox bash -lc "yarn prisma migrate deploy --schema=libs/db/schema.prisma"
scripts.prisma:studio: docker compose run --rm --service-ports toolbox bash -lc "yarn prisma studio --schema=libs/db/schema.prisma --browser none"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n client,admin,workers -c blue,green,magenta "yarn dev:client" "yarn dev:admin" "yarn dev:workers"
scripts.up: yarn stack:up && yarn prisma:gen && yarn prisma:deploy && yarn dev:all
